text: 16.27 Sng 62.12, Snd 24.12, Sek 14.5, Mat 25.31, 26.64, Mak 8.38, Luk 9.26, Lom 2.6, 1 Pi 1.17, Lep 22.12 Nɨgɨm. Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ne Bapi mɨlek awl dɨl kɨles awl dɨl, ensel okok ayɨp ownɨgab agak. Anɨb ñɨn ak, binɨb gɨtep gɨpal okok kɨlop pen gɨtep gɨnɨgab, binɨb tap tɨmel gɨpal okok pen gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgab agak.
